caption.center: Tom HARRIS, Movant, v. COMMONWEALTH of Kentucky, Opposed.

opinion.posture: Motion for an appeal from the Cumberland Circuit Court. Judgment of conviction for operating motor vehicle while drunk and imposing fine of $100.
opinion.attorneys:
Tanner Ottley for movant.
Hubert Meredith, Attorney General, and Arthur T. Iler, Assistant Attorney General, opposed.
